text: قال رب انى اخاف ان يكذبون

translations.translation: He said, 'My Lord, I fear they will deny me
: He said: "O Lord, I fear that they will deny me.
He said: "My Lord! I fear that they will brand me a liar.
He replied, "Lord, I am afraid that they will call me a liar.
He said, “My Lord, I fear that they will deny me.”
He said: "My Lord! Verily, I fear that they will deny me,"
He said: O my Lord! surely I fear that they will reject me;
He said, 'My Lord, I fear they will cry me lies,
He said: My Lord! Lo! I fear that they will deny me,
Moses replied, "My Lord, I fear they will reject me,
He said: my Lord! verily I fear they shall belie me.
He said, ‘My Lord! I fear they will impugn me,
He said: "O my Lord! I do fear that they will charge me with falsehood:
He said: "My Lord! Verily, I fear that they will belie me,
My Lord' he replied, 'I fear they will belie me
He said, “My Lord, I fear they will reject me.
He said, "My Lord, indeed I fear that they will deny me
[26:12] He, Moses, said, ‘My Lord, I fear they will deny me,
406 (He said) Moses said: (My Lord! Lo! I fear that they will deny me) I fear that they will disbelieve in the message I bring to them,

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وبعدما ناداه سبحانه ما ناداه { قَالَ } موسى ملتجئاً إلى الله
 مناجياً له: { رَبِّ } من رباني بأنواع اللطف والكرم { إِنِّيۤ } من غاية ضعفي وانفرادي { أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ } [الشعراء: 12] ولا يقبلون دعوتي ولا يتلفتون إلي


{ وَ } بذلك { يَضِيقُ صَدْرِي } ويكلُّ خاطري عن تبليغ ما أمرتني به { وَ } بعد ضيق صدري وكلٍّ خاطري { لاَ يَنطَلِقُ } ولا يجري { لِسَانِي } على تبينها وتفهمها
 مع أن في لساني لكنة جِبلِّة
 وبالجملة: أنا وحدي لا أطيق بحمل أعباء الرسالة وتبليغها
 واجعل لي يا ربي ظهيراً يعينني
